/hpc2hdd/home/xhao390/py/urbanclip/data/: The image captures a bustling city street in Beijing, China. The perspective is from a pedestrian's viewpoint on the sidewalk, immersing the viewer in the city's daily life. The street is flanked by towering buildings and modern skyscrapers, their glass and steel facades reflecting the overcast sky. Cars and buses traverse the road, adding a dynamic element to the scene. Trees line the street, providing a touch of nature amidst the urban landscape. The colors in the image are predominantly gray and green, with hints of red and blue adding vibrancy to the scene.
